tasks.label: Run Backend
tasks.command: $env:APP_ENV='dev'; $port = 8000; $conn = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conn) { $pid = $conn.OwningProcess | Select-Object -First 1; $proc = Get-Process -Id $pid -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host "`n❌ Port $port is already in use by process: $($proc.ProcessName) (PID: $pid)" -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host "`nTo kill the process, run:`n" -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host "  Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force`n" -ForegroundColor Cyan; exit 1 } else { .\env\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python run_server.py }

tasks.label: Run Frontend
tasks.command: $env:APP_ENV='dev'; $port = 5173; $conn = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conn) { $pid = $conn.OwningProcess | Select-Object -First 1; $proc = Get-Process -Id $pid -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host "`n❌ Port $port is already in use by process: $($proc.ProcessName) (PID: $pid)" -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host "`nTo kill the process, run:`n" -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host "  Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force`n" -ForegroundColor Cyan; exit 1 } else { npm run start }
